name: OSES - 2014 version
description:
Take control of three survivors on the zombie apocalipse in this minimalistic graphic game with some arcade-like features.

Use each survivor's gun advantage and try to take all of them out of the map in one piece.

Play with custom cloth colors for each survivor.

Buy once, play forever. 5 new maps are added every one or two weeks, and you don't have to pay for them separetly. There are nine so far.

Be sure to vote yes at greenlight.

Know about updates, follow me on twitter.

Stay updated with news.

Página para Brasileiros.
